classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: ECON201 or ECON222.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D or E.

Choose one of the following: RPTA112 or RPTA160.

Students interested in Outdoor Recreation Areas will take RPTA112, RPTA275, & RPTA325, and 14 units of Advisor Approved Electives.

Students interested in Community Career Areas will take RPTA160, RPTA260, & RPTA323, and 12 units of Advisor Approved Electives.

Choose one of the following: BUS212, BUS214, or AGB214.

Choose either BUS or AGB route. BUS212 or BUS214 is a prerequisite for BUS215, and AGB214 is a prerequisite for AGB323.
